scripts.release: npm run font && python3 src/yq/yqcss.py css/index.css src/index.css && gulp css html && rm -f src/index.css && mv dist/index.html ./index.html && webpack --mode=production --progress
scripts.debug: python3 src/yq/yqcss.py css/index.css src/index.css && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && rm -f src/index.css && cp src/index.html ./index.html && webpack --mode=development --progress
scripts.html: python3 src/yq/yqcss.py css/index.css src/index.css && python3 src/yq/yqcss.py templates dist && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && rm -f src/index.css && cp src/index.html ./index.html
scripts.font: python3 json2html.py && font-spider json2html.html && rm -f json2html.html
